long_description: This Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 Mini-7 U-lock delivers high security in a compact design, helping keep your bike protected. Stout 13mm hardened steel shackle resists cutting and leverage attacks; vinyl coating offers protection for your bike's finish. Reinforced, hardened crossbar design provides increased protection. Disc-style cylinder delivers a high level of security; rotating dust cover helps protect cylinder. Bumpers reduce rattling noise while you're transporting the Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 Mini-7 U-lock. Comes with 2 stainless steel keys and mounting bracket. Kryptonite rates this lock a 6 on their 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security.
short_description: This Kryptonite KryptoLok Series-2 Mini-7 U-lock delivers high security in a compact design, helping keep your bike protected.
